org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph

类 JobGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.JobGraph
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable

    public class JobGraph
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The JobGraph represents a Flink dataflow program, at the low level that the JobManager accepts. All programs from higher level APIs are transformed into JobGraphs.

    The JobGraph is a graph of vertices and intermediate results that are connected together to form a DAG. Note that iterations (feedback edges) are currently not encoded inside the JobGraph but inside certain special vertices that establish the feedback channel amongst themselves.

    The JobGraph defines the job-wide configuration settings, while each vertex and intermediate result define the characteristics of the concrete operation and intermediate data.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JobGraph(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId, String jobName)
      Constructs a new job graph with the given job ID (or a random ID, if null is passed), the given name and the given execution configuration (see ExecutionConfig).
      JobGraph(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId, String jobName, JobVertex... vertices)
      Constructs a new job graph with the given name, the given ExecutionConfig, the given jobId or a random one if null supplied, and the given job vertices.
      JobGraph(JobVertex... vertices)
      Constructs a new job graph with no name, a random job ID, the given ExecutionConfig, and the given job vertices.
      JobGraph(String jobName)
      Constructs a new job graph with the given name, the given ExecutionConfig, and a random job ID.
      JobGraph(String jobName, JobVertex... vertices)
      Constructs a new job graph with the given name, the given ExecutionConfig, a random job ID, and the given job vertices.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • JobGraph

        public JobGraph(String jobName)
        Constructs a new job graph with the given name, the given ExecutionConfig, and a random job ID. The ExecutionConfig will be serialized and can't be modified afterwards.
        参数:
        jobName - The name of the job.

      • JobGraph

        public JobGraph(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId,
                String jobName)
        Constructs a new job graph with the given job ID (or a random ID, if null is passed), the given name and the given execution configuration (see ExecutionConfig). The ExecutionConfig will be serialized and can't be modified afterwards.
        参数:
        jobId - The id of the job. A random ID is generated, if null is passed.
        jobName - The name of the job.

      • JobGraph

        public JobGraph(JobVertex... vertices)
        Constructs a new job graph with no name, a random job ID, the given ExecutionConfig, and the given job vertices. The ExecutionConfig will be serialized and can't be modified afterwards.
        参数:
        vertices - The vertices to add to the graph.

      • JobGraph

        public JobGraph(String jobName,
                JobVertex... vertices)
        Constructs a new job graph with the given name, the given ExecutionConfig, a random job ID, and the given job vertices. The ExecutionConfig will be serialized and can't be modified afterwards.
        参数:
        jobName - The name of the job.
        vertices - The vertices to add to the graph.

      • JobGraph

        public JobGraph(org.apache.flink.api.common.JobID jobId,
                String jobName,
                JobVertex... vertices)
        Constructs a new job graph with the given name, the given ExecutionConfig, the given jobId or a random one if null supplied, and the given job vertices. The ExecutionConfig will be serialized and can't be modified afterwards.
        参数:
        jobId - The id of the job. A random ID is generated, if null is passed.
        jobName - The name of the job.
        vertices - The vertices to add to the graph.

        public long getSessionTimeout()
        Gets the timeout after which the corresponding ExecutionGraph is removed at the job manager after it has been executed.
        返回:
        a timeout as a long in seconds.

      • setSessionTimeout

        public void setSessionTimeout(long sessionTimeout)
        Sets the timeout of the session in seconds. The timeout specifies how long a job will be kept in the job manager after it finishes.
        参数:
        sessionTimeout - The timeout in seconds

      • getVerticesAsArray

        public JobVertex[] getVerticesAsArray()
        Returns an array of all job vertices that are registered with the job graph. The order in which the vertices appear in the list is not defined.
        返回:
        an array of all job vertices that are registered with the job graph

      • getNumberOfVertices

        public int getNumberOfVertices()
        Returns the number of all vertices.
        返回:
        The number of all vertices.

      • setSnapshotSettings

        public void setSnapshotSettings(JobSnapshottingSettings settings)
        Sets the settings for asynchronous snapshots. A value of null means that snapshotting is not enabled.
        参数:
        settings - The snapshot settings, or null, to disable snapshotting.

      • getSnapshotSettings

        public JobSnapshottingSettings getSnapshotSettings()
        Gets the settings for asynchronous snapshots. This method returns null, when snapshotting is not enabled.
        返回:
        The snapshot settings, or null, if snapshotting is not enabled.

        参数:

        返回:
        the vertex with the matching ID or null if no vertex with such ID could be found

      • uploadRequiredJarFiles

        public void uploadRequiredJarFiles(InetSocketAddress serverAddress)
                            throws IOException
        Uploads the previously added user jar file to the job manager through the job manager's BLOB server.
        参数:
        serverAddress - the network address of the BLOB server
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs during the upload

      • getMaximumParallelism

        public int getMaximumParallelism()
        Gets the maximum parallelism of all operations in this job graph.
        返回:
        The maximum parallelism of this job graph

      • uploadUserJars

        public void uploadUserJars(ActorGateway jobManager,
                           scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration askTimeout)
                    throws IOException
        Uploads the previously added user JAR files to the job manager through the job manager's BLOB server. The respective port is retrieved from the JobManager. This function issues a blocking call.
        参数:
        jobManager - JobManager actor gateway
        askTimeout - Ask timeout
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown, if the file upload to the JobManager failed.
